rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a traditional Kerala-style reception area incorporating local art, natural ventilation and ample lighting.
An open-plan kitchen combined with a living area featuring traditional Kerala-style stone flooring, wood accents and large windows for natural light.
Guest room designed in accordance with Vastu principles ensuring privacy and positive energy flow, with locally sourced materials.
Ground floor bathroom designed for convenience, featuring natural light and ventilation with traditional Kerala aesthetic.

openings.description: Primary entrance ensuring ease of access while maintaining security and incorporating a verandah.
Secondary entrance used for garden access and utility entry, aligned with Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow.

garden.description: Large garden area designed with native Kerala flora, water features and seating areas for relaxation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom incorporating a private balcony with natural ventilation, designed in traditional Kerala style and following Vastu guidelines for harmonious living.
Bedroom 1 offering ample space with traditional decor elements and natural light to promote well-being.
Bedroom 2 designed as a guest or children's room with functional space and traditional Kerala styling.
First-floor bathroom designed with natural lighting, ventilation, and traditional Kerala fixtures.
Alcove or private study area integrated into the master bedroom to encourage privacy and productivity.

openings.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom providing outdoor relaxation space with views of the garden and adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Skylight integrated into common areas for enhanced natural light and ventilation across first-floor rooms.
